meta.name: keywords
meta.content: Jeopardy Archive Jason Sterlacci Jill Gilbert Kaberi Chakrabarty Final clue response question answer Daily Double

meta.name: description
meta.content: An archive of clues and players for Jeopardy! show #7300.

div.div:
2016 Teachers Tournament final game 2.
From DAR Constitution Hall in Washington, D.C.

td.p: Jason Sterlacci, a 6th grade English teacher from Somerset, New Jersey (subtotal of $22,601)
Jill Gilbert, a middle school English teacher from Des Moines, Iowa (subtotal of $10,000)
Kaberi Chakrabarty, an elementary bilingual teacher from Joliet, Illinois (subtotal of $4,600)

div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_J_1_1', 'clue_J_1_1_stuck', 'Seville oranges are big in making this preserve, a word from the Portuguese')

a.title: Suggest a correction for this clue

div.h3: Scores at the end of the Double Jeopardy! Round:

div.onmouseover:
toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', '(Alex: [To Jill] And that, unfortunately, is wrong.)
(Jill: He\'s from Kansas.)
...
(Jason: Lifesaver.)
(Alex: Lifesaver?)
(Jason: Yeah, he fixed my tie.)
JillWho is Bob Dole?
$1,600
KaberiWho is Bob Dole?
$0
JasonWho is Charles who Fixed My Tie?
$0
George McGovern')
div.onmouseout: toggle('clue_FJ', 'clue_FJ_stuck', 'He was awarded a DFC in WWII for a combat mission as pilot of the B-24 bomber he named the "Dakota Queen"')

tr.td: He was awarded a DFC in WWII for a combat mission as pilot of the B-24 bomber he named the "Dakota Queen"
